column1: The Pit Room////I loved it! I got waaay too much food
column3: but that means I can tell you my faves: the turkey was moist the brisket was amazing
column4: the pork rib fell off the bone. Great flavor! I also got the Mac and cheese and the green beans as sides
column5: asked the folks behind the counter for their opinions and they gave me the best choices! I also enjoyed the sausages
column6: but the brisket was the star. Would def go back
